    • Method Detail

      • transfigureEntity

        public org.bukkit.entity.Entity transfigureEntity(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                         org.bukkit.entity.EntityType toType)
        Transfigures entity into new EntityType. Do not use on players. Time length is usesModier() number of minutes plus 8 seconds.
        Parameters:
        entity - - Entity to transfigure
        toType - - Type to change entity into
        Returns:
        - The resulting entity.

      • transfigureEntity

        public org.bukkit.entity.Entity transfigureEntity(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                         org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack toStack)
        Transfigures entity into new Item entity with Itemstack toStack. Do not use on players.
        Parameters:
        entity - - Entity to transfigure
        toStack - - Stack to change entity into
        Returns:
        - The resulting Item entity.

      • endTransfigure

        public void endTransfigure()
        Ends the transfiguration. Drops items if there are any in it's inventory.

      • hasTransfigured

        public boolean hasTransfigured()
        Has the transfiguration effect happened yet?
        Returns:
        If the transfiguration has taken place

      • simpleTransfigure

        public void simpleTransfigure(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type)
        Moves the spell forward until it meets an entity and then performs a simple transfiguration on a non-player entity. This is the basic transfiguration code for most simple transfiguration spells.
        Parameters:
        type - - The EntityType to transfigure the non-player entity into

      • simpleTransfigure

        public void simpleTransfigure(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack)
        Moves the spell forward until it meets an entity and then performs a simple transfiguration on a non-player entity. This is the basic transfiguration code for most simple transfiguration spells.
        Parameters:
        stack - - The Item entity with ItemStack to transfigure the non-player entity into

        public int getToID()
        Gets the id of the transfigured entity
        Returns:
        the toID
